newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkey Isbank to sell stake to MAN AG.
newsitem.headline: Turkey Isbank to sell stake to MAN AG.

text.p: Turkiye Is Bankasi, a leading Turkish commercial bank, said it would sell its 49.08 percent stake in bus and truck producer Man Kamyon Ve Otobus Sanayi A.S. to the firm's foreign partner, German truck manufacturer and engineering group MAN Nutzfahrzeuge A.G.
In a statement sent to the Istanbul Stock Exchange, the bank said the sale would take place after MAN's executive board approves the deal.
The 49.08 percent stake in 2.24 trillion lira capital of Man Kamyon ve Otobus will be sold for 37.4 million marks in cash, the statement said.
The bank hopes to have a 1.4 trillion lira profit from the sale.
Is Bankasi holds equity stakes in about 50 industrial and finance companies.
